text: hey guys it's Celina I'm here to tell
you how excited I am about my new
fragrance and of course to thank you for
all of your love and support so I want
to give you guys the chance to help me
customize my new scents I've been
working really hard and I've narrowed it
down to a few possible notes but I need
your help in choosing the right ones
you'll get to compare several notes that
I've selected for the top heart and base
of the perfume not sure what they are no
problem I'll explain so top notes are
the first notes that you'll smell when
you spray on a perfume
usually they're light and smell like
citrus or maybe fruit now come the heart
notes the heart notes are sins that
create the middle of the fragrance the
body they really round out the fragrance
before drying into the base notes the
base notes are the final ingredients you
smell when wearing a perfume they last
the longest and usually are the richest
so now that you all know how to pick out
the ingredients you'd like to smell make
sure you vote so please go to selena
gomez perfumes comm to register the
first hundred-thousand to help will be
sent a free sample before the perfume
isn't even stores so finally a lucky ten
of you will be flown out to join me in
the fragrance lab to help me choose my
final scent we're all going to be
wearing my fragrance so why shouldn't
you have a say too
